column4: guys, i am new to ubuntu and trying to upgrade to mythtv 0.23 following this http://www.mythbuntu.org/auto-builds
i downloaded the http://www.mythbuntu.org/files/mythbuntu-repos.deb file and installed using dpkg -i
are you using mythbuntu or did you install myth-tv on a normal ubuntu installation?
i want the 0.23 version of mythtv
its all up and working already before you upgrade right?
i am setting up a new frontend, already have backend running on another system
okay you said you had the deb file already right? doesnt look like its in the repo from what i can see
i am using this webpage http://www.mythbuntu.org/auto-builds
guess, that page builds mythtv from upstream every day
yea interesting i never used this when i set up my mythtv box.. let me take a quick look
you already have the auto builds activated on your system right?
dont know what to do next.
i did a reload in synaptic and now  i see 0.23 version. cool!
i think .23 is pre-upgraded isnt it? i thought you said .27 was the upgrade
lol well yea i looked in synaptic and it was there in the first place =P sorry must have mis-read your post
